Detailed Description

Brush is the base class for all AggOO brushes (SolidBrush, TextureBrush, etc.)

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Member Function Documentation

Status AggOO::Brush::SetStatus ( Status  status  )  const [inline, protected]

Set the status of the brush

virtual Brush* AggOO::Brush::Clone (  )  const [pure virtual]

GDI+ seems to store the brush type in the base class. Since they work with this in DLL code, I'm not sure how they do things like clone it or retrieve its type. AggOO will use abstraction, since the base class shouldn't be called directly anyway, and otherwise, it will appear to be the same. The brush type, however, can be set rather easily, as was done in AggPlus.

Implemented in AggOO::SolidBrush, AggOO::TextureBrush, AggOO::LinearGradientBrush, and AggOO::LinearGradientBrushExt.
